K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:303b-43: mi rtag pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:303b-44: de la phyogs kyi'ang phyogs gcig shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon @304a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-1: nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-3: gal te la la zhig sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis chos spong ba 'di lta bu 'di bgyis par gyur na; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-4: de tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar thar par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-8: gal te lo bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig cing dus gsum du nyes pa la nyes par bshags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-10: de phyin chad nyung na bskal pa bcus bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-12: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bzung ma bklags par smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-13: chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba las ma smras par thar bar shin tu dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-15: byang chub sems dpas 'di la bslab nas phyis chos bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-19: byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa nyid bzhi khong du chud par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-21: sems can mnyam pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-23: byang chub mnyam pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-24: lhag mthong mnyam pa nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304a-25: mnyam pa nyid bzhi po de dag byang chub sems dpas khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-0: gang zhig @304b mnyam pa nyid bzhi po de dag khong du ma chud par smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-1: ci smra'ang de bdag smras par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-2: gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo ma smras par thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-5: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-6: shes pas mos nas chos smra ba rnams la 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-7: pha rol mi spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa thams cad la gus pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-9: chos bzhi po de dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-11: rigs kyi bu mo de ma smas par thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la nyin gcig bzhin du dbul ba phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-14: gang zhig gis rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te tha na lan gsum bklags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-16: de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:304b-17: de ci'i phyir zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' gang rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo 'di la bslab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yi rang nas byang chub tu go cha chen po bgos pas de dag thams cad bskal pa brgyad cur 'khor bar 'khor nas thams cad kyang bskal pa brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-9: byang chub sems dpa' dag nan tan gyis bsgrubs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-10: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar don che zhing de ltar 'bras bu che ste phan yon che la gsal ba che zhing rgyas pa che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-13: khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab ste phyi ma'i dus na chos gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-14: de ltar na khyed ma smras par thar par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305a-15: de nas chos smra ba nyi shu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-0: chos kyi rgyal po @305b bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-2: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' legs par rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-9: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-10: 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang mu ni warma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-008:305b-12: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
